name: Space Energy
description:
Be an astronaut and explore the universe planet by planet.

Collect energy and acceleration using the orbits of the planets.

Try to survive as long as you can.

Credits:

Arts and music by Filippo Gerosa

Coded by Stefano Tumminello and Guido Gerosa

Good news: the game is now available even for Android platform, download it for free from the Google Play Store following this link.
